full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BRTAN BZHUGS GSOL 'DEBS 'DOD PA'I RE SKONG 'DOD RGU YID BZHIN BSKO BA'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI ^RGYAL BA 'OD SNANG MTHA' YAS ZHING 'DIR MI YI GAR ROL KUN GZIGS PAn CHEN MCHOG GI SPRUL SKU RIN PO CHE'I ZHAL DKYIL MNGON GYUR THOG MAR BYUNG 'PHRAL, MTSAN BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN CHOS KYI NYI MA DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL ZHES GSOL TE, BSTAN DANG 'GRO BA YONGS KYI DPAL MGON DAM PAR ZHING 'DIR BSKAL PA RGYA MTSO'I BAR DU BRTAN BZHUGS KYI GSOL 'DEBS LA BRTZON 'DUN GYI YID KYI NYER LEN DANG BCAS TE YOD SKABS, PAn CHEN MCHOG GI 'PHRIN LAS PA DZA SAG BLA MA NAS KYANG NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL NGOR ^SH'AKYA'I RING LUGS 'DZIN PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO 'JIGS BRAL DBANG PHYUG PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I SDE DPAL BZANG POS RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA LA SA BYI LO'I HOR ZLA DANG PO'I DKAR PHYOGS DGA' BA GSUM PAR SMRAS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, , AOm MA nI PADME H'Um, AOm A'A: H'Um, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO 'JIGS BRAL DBANG PHYUG PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA,
